div.head: Description of changes for 2012.12
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft created from a copy of a descriptive transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. A transcription of the Sorbonne text still needs to be completed. Additions and correctionss will be made after a collation comparison of available manuscript witnesses. Unclear tags have been created around troublesome transcriptions. Ref attributes have been added to most names to point to canonical references. Cross-references, citations, and a critical apparatus still need to be constructed.
